select count(*) from tech_board where tech_num > 0
mapper.insert: insert into tech_board (tech_num, user_id, tech_category, tech_title, tech_con) values (tech_board_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{tech_category}, #{tech_title}, #{tech_con})

select tech_board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into tech_board (tech_num, user_id, tech_category, tech_title, tech_con) values (#{tech_num}, #{user_id}, #{tech_category}, #{tech_title}, #{tech_con})
mapper.update: update tech_board set tech_category = #{tech_category}, tech_title = #{tech_title}, tech_con = #{tech_con}, upt_dt = sysdate where tech_num = #{tech_num}
